title: I missed fasting in Ramadan can i make it up in 10 days of Dhul hijjah
transcript: hello yes s yeah yeah sh I want to ask that I miss seven fasts during Ramadan due to my mations so can I make them up in the 10 first days of Z as it's fasting in the first 10 days of Z is having more reward so can I make up my Raman first Salah first fast in the 10 days of Z yes you can yeah
